            Biography
            I work in the field of climate analysis and prediction at
            a government institution. In my work, I apply my expertise
            in data science, utilizing programming languages such as R
            and Python to process and analyze data, including spatial
            data, which is often my primary focus. Additionally, I have
            a deep interest in technology, particularly in exploring
            Linux as the operating system I frequently use for various
            computational tasks. Outside of work, I balance my life by
            playing music, especially the guitar, and staying active
            through running. This combination of interests in
            technology, music, and sports helps me grow both
            professionally and personally. If you’d like to download my
            CV, you can click this link.
             
            
            
            Education
            Bandung Institute of
            Technology | Bandung | M.Sc.
            M.Sc. in Earth Science (Atmospheric Science) | July 2020
            - October 2022
            State College of Meteorology
            Climatology And Geophysics | Bintaro |
            B.A.S
            B.A.S. in Climate Science | September 2013 - October
            2018
             
            
            
            Experience
            BMKG
            Headquarters | Climate Forecaster and Analyst |
            January 2018 - Present
            BMKG Regional IV
            Makassar | Weather & Climate Observer |
            November 2014 - October 2015
             
            Indonesia Monthly Rainfall Prediction (December
            2024)
            
             
            An explanation of climate modeling

              Biography
              I work in the field of climate analysis and prediction
              at a government institution. In my work, I apply my
              expertise in data science, utilizing programming languages
              such as R and Python to process and analyze data,
              including spatial data, which is often my primary focus.
              Additionally, I have a deep interest in technology,
              particularly in exploring Linux as the operating system I
              frequently use for various computational tasks. Outside of
              work, I balance my life by playing music, especially the
              guitar, and staying active through running. This
              combination of interests in technology, music, and sports
              helps me grow both professionally and personally. If you’d

articles.title: Several Sample Projects
articles.description: Here are some examples of projects that have been created.

articles.title: Several research studies that have been conducted
articles.description: Here are some research studies that have been conducted.
articles.contents:
Performance Evaluation of Operational Rainfall Prediction Models for Onset of Seasons Across Indonesia Area [2024, Conference Paper]ResearchGate DOI
IMERG-E satellite rainfall estimation error decomposition for early warning use in several parts of Indonesia [2022, Conference Paper]ResearchGate DOI
Comparison of ECMWF System 4 and CFSv2 Coupled Models for Season Prediction in Indonesia [2020, Journal]ResearchGate DOI
Identification of Rainfall and Air Temperature Changes using RClimdex in The Serang Region [2019, Journal]ResearchGate DOI
Identification of Dengue Haemorrhagic Fever (DHF) Occurrence Probability Based on Climate Parameter and its Projection Case Study: East Java [2019, Conference Paper]ResearchGate DOI
Interpretation of Radar and Weather Satellite Imagery, Plotting Radar Products Into Geographic Information System (GIS) Application [2017, Technical Report]ResearchGate DOI
Analysis Of the Suitability of Rainfall Prediction of Main Rainfall Posts (Cibeet, Cinangka, Tunggilis, Dayeun) with ZOM 66 West Java [2016, Technical Report]ResearchGate DOI
Analyzing The Relationship Between Cloud Top Temperature and Rainfall [2016, Technical Report]ResearchGate DOI
Geographic Information System Practice of Landslide Prone Area Map of East Java Province [2015, Technical Report]ResearchGate DOI
